completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color C to their maximum possible extent in the down direction.
Move all objects of color to the edges of grid.
Move all objects towards the object of color G, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than O to the right
Move all same-color diagonal pairs to the other diagonal positions with the same color.
Move all objects of color C one step up, if they are neighbors of any object.
Move all neighboring objects toward other objects of different colors, merging them if necessary.
Move all objects containing at least one cell of color X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it. Then recolor them to color X.
Move all objects to the nearest 'C' object, if they are neighbors of 'C'.
Remove all objects except for those that are objects of size 5 or objects of color G
Move all objects one cell down if they are neighbors of an object of color G.
Move all objects of color C to their right-most adjacent open spaces, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color C to the nearest edge.
Move all objects that are neighbors to color C, towards it.
Move all 'C' colored objects of size greater than 1 one step to the right.
Move all objects of color C by a maximum distance towards the down direction.
Move all objects containing yellow to the left
Move all objects color C one step down.
Move all objects of color C to the bottom row, while maintaining their relative horizontal positions.
Move all objects of color C to the position of the nearest neighboring object of color other than C.
Every object inside and neighbor of a Y object must be moved, if possible.
Move all C objects one step downwards, while preserving their neighbors, then move them one step right.
Move all objects of color C one step up.
Move all vertical objects one step to the right.
Move all objects of color C toward the top of the grid.
Move all the objects of color towards the bottom of the grid.
Move all objects of color C, without neighbors of color X, to their position in the adjacent grid in one step toward the right.
Move all isolated objects toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Extend all objects of size 1 towards the nearest object in the closest neighbor direction without overlapping.
Move all non-circular objects to the left, and recolor them to C
Move all objects of color different than O upward.
Move all objects of color C to the rightmost empty column.
Move all objects colored C to the bottom of the grid.
Move all objects of color C downward.
Move all objects of color C upward.
Move all objects of color C towards the object of color G, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all the middle objects to the bottom and to the right.
Move all objects of color C to the right-most position within each row.
Move all objects to the leftmost column where they fit without overlapping.
Move all objects except objects of size 1 towards the bottom until they reach an object or the edge of grid.
Move all objects of size 3 to the center-top of the grid.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (size_equals (size_of this) 3)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node up)
            (move_node up)
            (move_node up)
            (move_node left)
            (move_node left)
            (move_node left)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color different than O, toward the object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Shift all C-colored objects towards the bottom and then to the right if there are empty cells in that direction.
Move the leftmost non-red objects in columns containing red objects to the right.
Move all objects of color C one step left.
Move all objects upward until they hit another object or the edge of the grid.
Move all objects of color different than O, except for the ones in column 6, to their nearest neighbors.
Move all objects of color C to the bottom of the grid.
Move each object in the grid one step to the right.
Move all objects of color C one step down.
Move all objects of size 3 toward the closest object having the smallest size if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of shape 'square' to the bottom, and then recolor them to color C.
Move and reorder objects of color C according to specific positions.
Move all objects of color different than O, toward the nearest C object if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color C to the location of the nearest object of color G.
Move all objects of color adjacent to C towards the center of C and recolor all Cs to Y.
Move all 'C' objects down and then recolor them to 'C'.
Move all objects of size 2 towards the object of size 9, without overlapping.
Move objects of color C to their final output positions.
Move all objects of color to the right, keeping their position in the original grid empty.
Move all objects of color C to the rightmost side of their respective rows.
Move all objects of color C downward two steps.
Move objects of color C and Y down to fill vacant positions in the rows below.
Move all objects to the left.
Move all objects of color C one step to the left.
Move all objects of color C downward, if they are neighbors of an object of a different color.
Move all objects of color C one step to the left.
Move all objects of color C to the rightmost column.
Rotate objects of color C by 90 degrees clockwise.
Move the objects to the topmost available row maintaining their columns.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of maximum size, without overlapping.
Move all C objects horizontally based on their neighbor's position.
Move all objects of color different than O towards the nearest object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects one step down and then recolor them to color C.
Move all objects of color different than O to the bottom of the grid.
Move all objects of color C toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 3 toward the nearest object of size 1, without overlapping.
Move all objects towards the object of color C if they are neighbors, and then recolor them to color C.
Move all objects one step up and one step to the right, irrespective of their size or color.
Move all objects of color vertically toward the top boundary of the grid.
Move all objects of color C one step to the right.
Move all objects upward.
Move all objects that are not color O one step downward
Move all objects of color C to the left.
Move some objects up from their positions.
Move all objects with color other than O completely out of the grid.
Move all 'C' objects to the right, maximizing the number of steps.
Move all the objects to the top of the grid if they are of size 1.
Move all objects adjacent to an object of color C toward it, maximally.
Rotate all objects of color C by 90 degrees.
Move all objects one step down.
Move all objects of color C toward the object of maximum size, then recolor the moved objects to their new position color.
Move all objects of color C one step down, then move the objects of size greater than 1 up.
Move the objects of color C to the rightmost available position while maintaining the same column within their row
Move all objects of color C one step down.
Move square objects one position down, keeping their color and structure intact.
Move all objects of color C toward the object of color G, if they are neighbors of it, then recolor them to B.
Move all objects toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects containing colors G, Y, and B upwards.
Move all objects of color C one step up.
